tag_list: peter-egan, medical-equipment, medical-suppies, e-commerce, consulting, louisiana
overview:
Peter Egan is a 30 year old entrepreneur, marketing professional and occasional columnist.

Born in New Orleans, Peter has spent the majority of his time in the great state of Louisiana, having recently moved to the Mississippi gulf coast in order to fulfill a desire to reside on the beach.

Peter is the founder of Egan Medical Equipment & Supply, the online retail division medical equipment company affiliated with Egan Healthcare Services of Louisiana. Once Egan Medical’s move across state lines is complete, it will mark the first Egan company to conduct business from a state other than Louisiana.

Egan Medical was the product of nearly a decade’s worth of experience in the e-commerce field, during which time Peter also founded such companies as GoDOTyourself.com and Premium Domains by Fat Lester.

Peter attended St. Paul School in Covington, LA, where he obtained his high school diploma in the year 2000. He attended college primarily at Tulane, majoring in Media Arts with a minor in Marketing.

He started his first business in May of 2005, and to this day is still his own employer, the only exception being a six month stint working as a campaign consultant for a United State’s Senator’s reelection bid (which was wildly successful despite forecasters predicting a close race).

Peter entered the workforce at age 17 as a sports reporter and feature columnist for a local newspaper now known as the St. Tammany News.
